name: cpac_flat
title: Flat view definition for Comprehensive Post-Abortion Care Observation resource
description: A flattened view of Observation resources representing Comprehensive Post-Abortion Care (CPAC), extracting core details and various context extensions.

column.name: id
column.description: The logical ID of the Observation resource.

column.name: status
column.description: The status of the Observation (e.g., final).

column.name: category_procedure_code
column.description: The procedure category code, if present.

column.name: category_procedure_display
column.description: The procedure category display, if present.

column.name: category_exam_code
column.description: The exam category code, if present.

column.name: category_exam_display
column.description: The exam category display, if present.

column.name: observation_code
column.description: The primary CPAC code for the observation.

column.name: observation_display
column.description: The display text for the primary CPAC code.

column.name: observation_text
column.description: The text description for the observation code.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: The ID of the Patient subject.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: The ID of the Encounter context.

column.name: effective_datetime
column.description: The date and time the observation is effective.

column.name: ext_cpac_pregnancy_age_weeks
